title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Do Business With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us             Do Business With Us         Part of Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park is integrated with the busy port town of Skagway, Alaska. NPS photo  Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park works with many vendors, businesses, and tenants.  Because of our unique location integrated with the town of Skagway we do not have commercial food or logding vendors.  However, we do lease some of our historic building in Skagway for business use.  We also work with commercial tour and shuttle operators that take people into the park commercially.
